attributes.action: GET OUT OF DOWNING STREET AND LET THE PEOPLE OF BRITAIN BEGIN A REVOLUTION
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the British people are fed up with the current government, and the others are just as bad! We feel that a revolution is called for and to appoint a fair and equal 'People's Parliament'. One where we protect British jobs, oust immigrants who are work-shy and out to claim every benefit under the sun and to bring back 'National Service', so that the chavs of Britain have something to do, rather than hang about on the streets causing a nuisance.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
